ygData.subject: Re: Harrasment and E'Ci...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... their ... himself ... Ooooo!  Ooooo!  I could do it.  But on a more serious note wouldn t without your knowing or in the middle of GM discussions ... And
ygData.messageBody:
>If I see him online, I am tempted to do a tell to him and tell him I saw
their
>web site, and am very supportive of gay people and wish his guild luck
>(pretending I'm straight of course.) He may decide to delete the thing
himself
>if I do that. If I do it, I'll be sure to /log first to record everything for
>you all to see.

Ooooo! Ooooo! I could do it. But on a more serious note wouldn't without
your knowing or in the middle of GM discussions ...

And on the website, great! I wonder if I can bug a friend and see what
royalty free graphics we can dig up ... I also can do Logo-type graphics
and have had some companies and groups use mine before, I still have my
graphics package (I bought it). If anyone has freehand graphics though, I
do have a scanner and can scan if they are sent to me and get it in a
variety of graphics formats (as well as photo touch-up work, etc ...).

- Lora
